import './styling/PortfolioPopUp.css'; import {formatDate} from '../utils/FormatDate'; import React from 'react'; const PortfolioPopUp = ({portfolio, isVisible, closeFunction}) => { // const UPLOADS_URL = '/api/uploads'; // const [currentFile, setCurrentFile] = useState(null); return (
{portfolio.name} {portfolio.studentId} {portfolio.currentSchoolYear} {portfolio.languagesSpoken} {portfolio.email} {portfolio.phoneNumber} {portfolio.kakaoId} {portfolio.major} {portfolio.specializeInterest} {portfolio.averageGpa}

{portfolio.skillsExpertise}

{portfolio.achievements}

{portfolio.experiences}

{portfolio.personalStatement}

); }; export default PortfolioPopUp;
